004package mkt.model;
005
006import java.util.Arrays;
007import mkt.Model;
008
009/** Movil average model (2) */
010public class Ma {
011  /**
012   * Constructor.
013   * @return InvModel
014   */
015  public static Model mk () {
016    return new Model(
017      "MM",
018      "Media móvil",
019      new String[]{"Días", "Banda"},
020      new int[]{Model.DAY_PARAM, Model.PERC_PARAM},
021      (closes, params) -> {
022        int days = (int)(params[0] + 0.4);
023        double strip = params[1];
024        double stripUp = 1 + strip;
025        double stripDown = 1 - strip;
026        double[] cls0 = closes[0];
027        int ndates = closes.length;
028        int ncos = cls0.length;
029
030        double[][] allRefs = new double[ndates][ncos];
031
032        boolean[] isSolds = new boolean[ncos];
033        Arrays.fill(isSolds, false);
034        double[] refs = new double[ncos];
035        Arrays.fill(refs, 0);
036        double[] sums = new double[ncos];
037        Arrays.fill(sums, 0);
038
039        for (int idate = 0; idate < ndates; ++idate) {
040          double[] closesR = closes[idate];
041          double[] oldCloses = idate >= days ? closes[idate - days] : closesR;
042
043          for (int ico = 0; ico < ncos; ++ico) {
044            double c = closesR[ico];
045            double oldC = oldCloses[ico];
046
047            if (idate < days) {
048              sums[ico] += c;
049              refs[ico] = c * stripDown;
050            } else if (idate == days) {
051              sums[ico] += c - oldC;
052              double avg = sums[ico] / days;
053
054              if (c <= avg) {
055                isSolds[ico] = true;
056                refs[ico] = avg * stripUp;
057              } else {
058                refs[ico] = avg * stripDown;
059              }
060            } else {
061              double rf = refs[ico];
062              sums[ico] += c - oldC;
063              double avg = sums[ico] / days;
064
065              if (isSolds[ico]) {
066                if (c > rf) {
067                  isSolds[ico] = false;
068                  refs[ico] = avg * stripDown;
069                } else {
070                  double newRf = avg * stripUp;
071                  if (newRf < rf) refs[ico] = newRf;
072                  else refs[ico] = rf;
073                }
074              } else {
075                if (c < rf) {
076                  isSolds[ico] = true;
077                  refs[ico] = avg * stripUp;
078                } else {
079                  double newRf = avg * stripDown;
080                  if (newRf > rf) refs[ico] = newRf;
081                  else refs[ico] = rf;
082                }
083              }
084            }
085          }
086          allRefs[idate] = Arrays.copyOf(refs, ncos);
087        }
088        return allRefs;
089      }
090    );
091  }
092}
